definition: to get around using a conveyance (car, bicycle, sedan chair etc)/to ride (or drive)/means of transportation
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)

sentences.english: The Leaf is an all-electric vehicle that is designed for short commutes.
sentences.chinese: 聆風則是專爲短途代步而設計的電動車。

sentences.english: It is a toll to ride instead of walk, worthy of the name of 'one car for multipurpose'.
sentences.chinese: 是名副其實的一車多用，還可達到代步的目的。

sentences.english: Lucy has just bought a car which lets her drive to her workplace every day.
sentences.chinese: 露絲新買了一輛小汽車，每天以車代步去上班。

sentences.english: No, it just gets you there faster.
sentences.chinese: 不會，開車只是一種提速代步的工具。

sentences.english: With the campus spread out so far, many students ride bicycles instead of walking.
sentences.chinese: 校區散佈整個海城，許多學生以腳踏車代步。

sentences.english: It will save time if we drive the car instead of walking.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們以車代步的話可以節省時間。

sentences.english: My car is being repaired, so I've no transport to the concert.
sentences.chinese: 我的車正在修理，所以我沒有去音樂會的代步工具。

sentences.english: I've no transport to the concert, because my car is being repaired.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有去音樂會的代步工具，因爲我的車在修理。

sentences.english: It has been living in the Venetian lagoon on the car.
sentences.chinese: 它一直是居住在瀉湖上的威尼斯人代步的工具。

sentences.english: A car is only a means of transportation and doesn't need to be expensive, I told her.
sentences.chinese: 車就是個代步工具，沒必要多貴的。

sentences.english: The armed forces of the world often lose vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的軍隊經常遺失作戰的代步工具。

sentences.english: Now, with cars as a fashion, but I like walking.
sentences.chinese: 如今，以車代步成爲一種時尚，而我卻喜歡步行。

definition: vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
to carry a passenger/(of spaceships etc) manned/also pr. [zai3 ren2]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
racing bicycle (abbr. for 公路自行車|公路自行车[gong1 lu4 zi4 xing2 che1])
